## Source: ossf-package-analysis (4bee6dc4af217ab7789d50b0fed6b7d01749bf9ef8c725c1dfee59c068f9af3b)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'integration-web-core--socle' @ 1.4.2 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
